bit-field.name: RSTDISBL
bit-field.description: Reset Disabled (Enable PB7 as i/o pin)

bit-field.name: EESAVE
bit-field.description: Preserve EEPROM through the Chip Erase cycle

bit-field.name: LID
bit-field.description: Identifier bit 5 or Data Length bits

bit-field.name: LAINC
bit-field.description: Auto Increment of Data Buffer Index (Active Low)

bit-field.name: LINDX
bit-field.description: FIFO LIN Data Buffer Index bits

bit-field.name: OCIE0A
bit-field.description: Timer/Counter0 Output Compare Match A Interrupt Enable

bit-field.name: TCR0AUB
bit-field.description: Timer/Counter0 Control Register A Update Busy

bit-field.name: TCR0BUB
bit-field.description: Timer/Counter0 Control Register B Update Busy

bit-field.name: OCF1B
bit-field.description: Timer/Counter1 Output Compare B Match Flag

bit-field.name: OCF1A
bit-field.description: Timer/Counter1 Output Compare A Match Flag

bit-field.name: OCIE1B
bit-field.description: Timer/Counter1 Output Compare B Match Interrupt Enable

bit-field.name: OCIE1A
bit-field.description: Timer/Counter1 Output Compare A Match Interrupt Enable

bit-field.name: FOC1A
bit-field.description: Timer/Counter1 Force Output Compare for Channel A

bit-field.name: FOC1B
bit-field.description: Timer/Counter1 Force Output Compare for Channel B

bit-field.name: OC1BX
bit-field.description: Timer/Counter1 Output Compare X-pin Enable for Channel B

bit-field.name: OC1BW
bit-field.description: Timer/Counter1 Output Compare W-pin Enable for Channel B

bit-field.name: OC1BV
bit-field.description: Timer/Counter1 Output Compare V-pin Enable for Channel B

bit-field.name: OC1BU
bit-field.description: Timer/Counter1 Output Compare U-pin Enable for Channel B

bit-field.name: OC1AX
bit-field.description: Timer/Counter1 Output Compare X-pin Enable for Channel A

bit-field.name: OC1AW
bit-field.description: Timer/Counter1 Output Compare W-pin Enable for Channel A

bit-field.name: OC1AV
bit-field.description: Timer/Counter1 Output Compare V-pin Enable for Channel A

bit-field.name: OC1AU
bit-field.description: Timer/Counter1 Output Compare U-pin Enable for Channel A

register.name: OCR1A
register.description: Timer/Counter1 Output Compare Register A Bytes

register.name: OCR1B
register.description: Timer/Counter1 Output Compare Register B Bytes

register.name: AMISCR
register.description: Analog Miscellaneous Control Register (Shared with CURRENT_SOURCE IO_MODULE)

register.name: ADCSRA
register.description: The ADC Control and Status register A

register.name: ADCSRB
register.description: The ADC Control and Status register B (Shared with ANALOG_COMPARATOR IO_MODULE)

bit-field.name: MUX
bit-field.description: Analog Channel and Gain Selection Bits

register.name: AMISCR
register.description: Analog Miscellaneous Control Register (Shared with AD_CONVERTER IO_MODULE)

register.name: ACSR
register.description: Analog Comparator Control And Status Register

bit-field.name: ACIS
bit-field.description: Analog Comparator Interrupt Mode Select bits

register.name: ADCSRB
register.description: Analog Comparator & ADC Control and Status Register B (Shared with AD_CONVERTER IO_MODULE)

bit-field.name: ACIR
bit-field.description: Analog Comparator Internal Voltage Reference Select Bits

bit-field.name: PCIE
bit-field.description: Pin Change Interrupt Enable on any PCINT14..8 pin

bit-field.name: CSUT
bit-field.description: Clock Start-up Time bit 1 - SUT1 fuse substitution

bit-field.name: CSEL
bit-field.description: Clock Source Select bit 3 - CKSEL3 fuse substitution
